mapper.select: select item.`타입` as type, item.`높이` as hd,item.`가로` as wd, item.`이름` as name, item.`번호` as itemno from inven inner join item on inven.`템번호` = item.`번호` where item.`유저번호` = #{kkono}
mapper.insert: insert into item(이름, 높이, 가로, 타입, 유저번호) values (#{name}, #{hd}, #{wd}, #{type}, #{kkono})
